item.title: Telephone in the train
item.description: You might think that there is a lot of people sending and receiving phone calls in the metro or the train because Japanese people love their mobiles so much… No. It was the case some years ago, when the mobile fever started. The situation was so bad that the government passed new laws and calling is forbidden in trains. Even further, the telephone must be set on manner mode (silence or vibrating).
